description: To test User Service API endpoints for creating, fetching, updating, and deleting users

steps.name: Given  I send a GET request to "/users/username/{firstname}" with the stored user first name
Then  I should receive a valid response with status code 200
And  the response should contain the correct user details for the stored user first name
